automation_yaml:
id: 'daily_office_wled_1700_brightness_sequence'
alias: Daily 5 PM Office WLED Brighten Then Dim
description: "At 5:00 PM, set Office WLED to ~80%, wait 1 minute, then dim to ~40%"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '17:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 204
  - delay: '00:01:00'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 102
